  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(int nTur, java.lang.String CodG, boolean threePl, Player currPl, Grid oldG, Grid newG, MoveList move)
      constructor
      Parameters:
      nTur - indicates the number of turn passed + 1
      CodG - the game ID which is unique
      threePl - boolean which indicates if the game has three players (true)
      currPl - indicates the current player of the 2/3 that are playing the game
      oldG - the old grid, before the move
      newG - the new grid made after the move was set
      move - the possible moves
